H0.text: the actual name of the confederate force at gettysburg was. Army of Northern Virginia

H1.text: the actual name of the confederate force at gettysburg was. Southern Cross Brigade

H2.text: the actual name of the confederate force at gettysburg was. Rebel Forces

H3.text: the actual name of the confederate force at gettysburg was. Confederate States Army

A4.text: the organization of units as of March 14 was the same organization that Lee received on June 1, and thus it is generally referred to today as the Army of Northern Virginia

A5.text: the Army of Northern Virginia now comprised a total of 75,054 soldiers at the Battle of Gettysburg
